Manhattan.Kramer Complex: The Kramer Complex is a grouping of Kansas State University residence halls on the west side of the university's Manhattan campus. The complex features two residence halls, Goodnow and Marlatt Hall, as well as the Kramer Dining Center. The Kramer Dining Center was named in 1965 for the former Assistant Dean of Home Economics Martha M. Kramer, who held the position between 1945 and 1960.
